name: coralee scarf
notes:
coralee scarf is a knitted small scarf, starts and end with a triangle. 

you can find suitable yarn at www.querstricker.de. 
i used kimono single by querstricker, but feel free choose any fingering weight yarn you like (approx. 360–400 m).

follow me an instagram: kalmknit
for instagram use: #coraleescarf #kalmknit

this pattern is for free, but if you want to say “thank you”, please create a project here on ravelry.
if you like to give me a little support for my next projects, feel free to do this to my paypal account: as a friend to: s.kalmbacher@online.de

enjoy the pattern!
